long description: Local Idea Mobile Calls @10p/min -- Other Local mobile calls @30p/min

Free Local Idea mobile calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
